subtitle: A quick and simple jam that does not have to be cooked - only frozen.

method.text: Coarsely blend or finely chop the peaches. Stir in the sugar and lemon juice. Leave for about 1 hour until the sugar has dissolved.
Put into a freezerproof container. Add the pectin and stir gently for 3 min, leaving a little space at the top to allow for expansion.
Label and freeze for up to 6 months. To serve, thaw in the fridge and use within 1 week of opening.

title: Peach freezer jam
